### PublishingOptions.AfterIdleCount property
</br>


#### Gets or sets the Number of counts idle to publish.The default value is 1.

```csharp
public int AfterIdleCount { get; set; }
```

### Remarks

The `AfterIdleCount` less than 1 the [`Enabled`](./Enabled.md) is false.
